title.rendered: GIFS – The IIG Information Systems & Technology Program

content.rendered:
CRITERIA / REQUIREMENTS
IT Graduates in the Insurance / Finance Sector preferred
Employed in the Insurance Industry or Insurance Department
Able to travel to Bryanston Sandton, Jhb
Available for Judges Day on 05 July 2024
Clear credit & criminal records.
Able to commit to the 12-month program
Adhoc face-to-face training sessions

Cost: Non IIG Members = R8 000
IIG Members = R5 000

Apply via the link: https://forms.gle/N7SYXy5AFLrzuLb78
Application deadline: Thursday, 27 June 2024
